## Integer.Calculated.resolve() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
resolve(resolver?: Numeric.GenericResolver): Canonical;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resolver | Numeric.GenericResolver | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[Canonical](./alfa-css.integer.canonical.md)

## Remarks

Numbers are rounded to the nearest integer upon resolving calculation

[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-values/\#calc-type-checking](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-values/#calc-type-checking)
